Walmart Stores Inc.

Programmer in Retail Technology

Point of Sale Team

As a developer in retail technology on the point of sale team, I led a team of software developers in creating in-house web programs to assist the operation of one of the busiest departments in the organization.

Responsibilities

  • Support application development by leading meetings and code reviews with team
  • Monitor system alerts and other application checks and balances
  • Verify application performance, availability, and reliability
  • Defining potential solutions and implementing improvements to products, applications, alerts, and monitors
  • Engaging in war room and focus room meetings, participating in management change processes.
  • Supports the business by responding to user questions and problems, working problem tickets, troubleshooting problems for root cause, and reviewing problem resolutions and installation plans according to defined escalation procedures.
  • Manage team projects and follow development life cycle processes by gathering requested information, writing, testing, and debugging programs and scripts, implementing test scripts and procedures, testing and installing third-party software, writing instruction manuals, compiling documentation reports, and documenting application changes.
  • Support the implementation of business solutions by building relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders.
  • Identifying business needs, determining and carrying out necessary processes and practices, and monitoring progress and results.
  • Adapt to competing demands, organizational changes, and new responsibilities.

Technologies
